### 파티셔닝: RAID10(12x 4TB SAS)
~~~
$ df -h
Filesystem      Size  Used Avail Use% Mounted on
......
/dev/sda3       295G  2.3G  277G   1% /
/dev/sda1       1.1G  6.2M  1.1G   1% /boot/efi
/dev/sda4       196G  402M  186G   1% /var
/dev/sda5       5.0T   99G  5.0T   2% /data
/dev/sda6       9.1T  178G  8.9T   2% /home
......
~~~
